traits.appearance: has an unusual eye color (or two different colors)
traits.abilities: is powerful, brawny, and strong as an ox, but is clumsy and fumbling

personality.mannerism: Fearful at the sight of drawn weapons
personality.interaction: is keeping a secret from the Party
